aboutUsPage.header: What Is CuponZ And How Valid Is It?
aboutUsPage.description: CuponZ is a leading platform for finding and sharing discount coupons across a wide range of products and services. Our mission is to help consumers save money while supporting businesses in reaching new customers.

company.title: Our Company
company.content: CuponZ was founded with the vision of revolutionizing the way people save money on their purchases. We've grown from a small startup to a trusted name in the coupon industry, always putting our users first.

products.title: Our Products
products.content: We offer a wide range of digital coupons and promotional codes for various categories including electronics, fashion, food, travel, and more. Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and accessible across all devices.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.content: Our team is composed of passionate individuals from diverse backgrounds. We believe in fostering a collaborative environment where creativity and innovation thrive. Together, we work towards delivering exceptional value to our customers.

contactUs.quote: Say something to start a live chat!
contactUs.address: 132 Dartmouth Street Boston, Massachusetts 02156 United States

thankYou.content2: You will not see your product right away after uploading.
thankYou.content3: Thank you for being patient while waiting for our admin to approve your product.
